import React,{useContext,useState,useEffect}from"react";import{ProductsContext}from"../../context/ProductsContext";import Carousel from"@itseasy21/react-elastic-carousel";import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Hero(){const{products}=useContext(ProductsContext);const[productsTrending,setProductsTrending]=useState([]);const breakPoints=[{width:1,itemsToShow:1},{width:550,itemsToShow:1,itemsToScroll:productsTrending.length},{width:768,itemsToShow:1},{width:1200,itemsToShow:1}];useEffect(()=>{if(products&&products.length){setProductsTrending(products.filter(product=>product.category==="Trending Products"));}},[products]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hero",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"glide",id:"glide_1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"glide__track","data-glide-el":"track",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"glide__slides",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{breakPoints:breakPoints,isInfinite:true,enableAutoPlay:true,autoPlaySpeed:8000// la vitesse de lecture automatique en millisecondes
,enableSwipe:true// autoriser le glissement tactile pour changer de slide
,transitionMs:1000// la durée de la transition en millisecondes
,disableArrowsOnEnd:false// désactiver les flèches de navigation au début/à la fin de la liste
,showArrows:true// afficher les flèches de navigation
,itemsToScroll:1// nombre d'éléments à faire défiler
,tiltEasing:"ease-out"// l'effet d'inclinaison au survol
,tiltAngleX:10// l'angle d'inclinaison horizontale
,tiltAngleY:0// l'angle d'inclinaison verticale
// personnaliser les flèches de navigation >
,children:productsTrending.map((productTrend,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"glide__slide",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero__center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero__left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"",children:"New Inspiration 2020"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"",children:"PHONES MADE FOR YOU!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Trending from mobile and headphone style collection"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/details/".concat(productTrend.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"hero__btn",type:"submit",children:"SHOP NOW"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hero__right",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hero__img-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/details/".concat(productTrend.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"banner_01",src:productTrend.image,alt:productTrend.title})})})})]})},index))})})})})})});}
